mapper.update: update medical_manage set idx=#{idx}, vaccineCode=#{vaccineCode}, realShotDate=#{realShotDate} where idx=#{idx} and vaccineCode=#{vaccineCode}
mapper.delete: delete from medical_manage where idx=#{idx} and vaccineCode=#{vaccineCode}
mapper.select: select * from medical_manage where idx=#{idx} and vaccineCode=#{vaccineCode}
